column2: "Woyinom nye David ne mba a ɔwoo hɔn wɔ Hebron: abakan
column3: Amnon a ɔnye Jezreelnyi Ahinoam woo no no; otsia ebien
column4: Daniel a ɔnye Karmelnyi Abigail woo no no;"
Gesurhen Talmai ne babaa Maaka ba no; otsia anan

column3: Sefatia a ɔnye Abital woo no; otsia esia
column4: Itream a ɔnye ne yer Egla woo no."

column2: "Beesia na wɔwoo hɔn maa no wɔ Hebron; na hɔ na odzii hen mfe esuon na abosoom esia: na Jerusalɛm na odzii hen mfe eduasa ebiasa."
"Na woyinom na ɔwoo hɔn wɔ Jerusalɛm: Simea
column6: dɛm baanan yi na ɔnye Ammiel ne babaa Bat-seba woo hɔn."

column2: "Ne mba no binom so nye; Ibhar

column3: nna ɔsor nwewefo mba no so. Ɔwoo babaa so a ɔtoo no Tamar."

column2: "Josia ne mba yɛ baanan. N’abakan nye Johanan
"Na Jekonia ndɔmmumnyi no ne mba nye; Sealtiel

column3: na Simei. Zerubabel ne mba nye Mesullam
column4: na Hanania; na Selomit nye hɔn akyerɛbaa:"

column3: na Jesaia. Jesaia ne ba nye Refaia
column5: ne ba nye Obadia na ɔno so ne ba nye Sekania."

column2: "Na Sekania ne ba nye Semaia: na Semaia ne ba nye Hatus
